text: Bruce Wolfe's statue of Barbara Jordan on the University of Texas at Austin campus was erected in 2009. ==See also== * 2009 in art ==References== Category:2009 sculptures Category:Monuments and memorials in Texas Category:Outdoor sculptures in Austin, Texas Category:Sculptures of women in Texas Category:Statues in Texas Category:University of Texas at Austin campus
title: Statue of Barbara Jordan (University of Texas at Austin)
